creator: oleg@tkachenko.com
text:
XML Spy has a nice feature, which allows to run FOP on fo or xml files in one
click. It would be nice to have such plugins for other widespread xml/xsl
editors or IDE, e.g. for xemacs, JEdit, XMetal, eclipse, you name it.

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text: Most XML editors today have FOP plug-ins. If anyone wants to write a plug-in for FOP for some product, he's free to do that. I don't think it makes sense to keep this open any longer.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
